title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4229.2 - Dead heat for first place
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4229.2 - Dead heat for first place

State Regulations

When two horses run a dead heat for first place, all
prizes to which first and second horses would have been entitled shall be
divided equally between them; and this applies in dividing prizes whatever the
number of horses running a dead heat and whatever places for which the dead
heat is run. Each horse shall be deemed a winner and liable to penalty for the
amount he shall receive. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4229.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
